title: STANDBOX
description: STANDBOX is about that urge that you might have had as a kid, when you were more interested about the tech-demo than the game advertised. Stray Gods: The Roleplaying Musical Itâ€™s an interactive sandbox where you get to bully a smart ragdoll. He can stand, tries to balance himself up, fall and get back-up, and is animated by an approximation of a medical system that includes organs . You can damage him or play with him, throw him around and more.

system_requirements.Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
system_requirements.Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
